ygData.subject: Re: some questions
ygData.msgSnippet: If you press the right buttons , the cheats give you lots of things , EX: gain hitpoints , fly , gain magic points , decrease level (TEMP.) , increase level
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 18
Message-ID: <17248.18.59.959279670@...>
Date: Sun, 28 Feb 1999 18:00:15 EST
From: Chrono1O2@...
Subject: Re: some questions

If you press the right buttons , the cheats give you lots of things , EX: gain
hitpoints , fly , gain magic points , decrease level (TEMP.) , increase level
(Temp.) and other things . All the potions give you either mana increse(blue)
, hitpoint increase(green) , or gain the ability to fly(Red) . Im not sure if
you can play over via modem cuz I never tried it .
